===Etymology===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=てんのう'}} {{m|cmn|電腦}} (literally, "[[electronic]] [[brain]]").

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|でんのう|kyu=電腦}}

# Chinese term for {{m|en|computer}}.

====Usage notes====
Not used much in Japanese. The terms {{ja-r|コンピュータ}} and {{ja-r|パソコン}} are much more common.
